content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

--Query delta format with folder (folder should contain delta_log folder)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]

--Selecting column
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) with (
    VendorID INT,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
    RatecodeID INT,
    PULocationID INT,
    DOLocationID INT,
    passenger_count INT,
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    fare_amount FLOAT,
    extra FLOAT,
    mta_tax FLOAT,
    tip_amount FLOAT,
    tolls_amount FLOAT,
    ehail_fee INT,
    improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    congestion_surcharge FLOAT,
    year VARCHAR(4),
    month VARCHAR(4)
)
AS [result];

--Use partitioning column for filtering
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) with (
    trip_distance FLOAT,
    trip_type INT,
    year VARCHAR(4),
    month VARCHAR(4)
    ) AS [result]
WHERE year = '2020' AND month = '02';
